subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Marseille’s lackluster season took another turn for the worse as the nine-time French champion bowed out of the League Cup quarterfinals while its bitter rival Paris St.-Germain advanced with a 2-1 win over Lyon.
snippet: Marseille’s lackluster season took another turn for the worse as the nine-time French champion bowed out of the League Cup quarterfinals while its bitter rival Paris St.-Germain advanced with a 2-1 win over Lyon.
